EmailTemplate.name: INSURANCE INFORMATION
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Insurance request at ICCU
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Your insurance information was submitted successfully!
The Insurance Center will verify that the information you provided meets the insurance requirements. If the insurance information is not accepted you will receive notice in the mail.
It has been our pleasure to help. If there is anything else we can do, please do not hesitate to contact us. We appreciate your membership. Have a wonderful day!
Thank you,
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName}
Idaho Central Credit Union
P.O. Box 2469
Pocatello, ID 83206
d: (208) 239-3000 | f: (208) 239-3055
